data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Nyingtri, Xizang, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nyingtri, Xizang, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Nyingtri you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Nyingtri to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,491 believers in the county of Nyingtri the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Tseku people might believe through him.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Nyingtri, Xizang, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Nyingtri, Xizang, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nyingtri, Xizang, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Nyingtri
location.people_groups_list: Adi, Deng, Geman, Lhoba, Idu, Charumba, Adi Ramo
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Adi (1,300), Deng, Geman (15,000), Lhoba, Idu (10,000), Charumba (800), Adi Ramo (200)
